multi_session_reasoning.answer: You should prioritize a balanced training plan that integrates shooting power and accuracy drills (leveraging your shot tracking and goal data), endurance and agility work (to sustain running demands and pressing adaptation), passing precision exercises (to maintain your target pass accuracy), and tactical drills focused on aggressive pressing and defensive transitions. This approach aligns with your performance metrics, positional demands, and recent formation changes, ensuring you enhance scoring output without sacrificing passing efficiency or tactical responsiveness.

Balancing shooting accuracy and passing skills
Performance metrics of goals and assists
Balancing defensive formation with personal goals

Incorporate passing skill development to maintain or improve passing accuracy, considering your personal goal and midfielder role.
Factor in running distance data to ensure endurance and agility training supports sustained high-intensity efforts during matches and pressing.
Integrate tactical adaptation to aggressive pressing, requiring enhanced speed, positioning, and team coordination.
Consider the impact of the new defensive formation on your role, balancing defensive responsibilities with offensive contributions.
Synthesize all data points to recommend a comprehensive, balanced training focus that maximizes scoring while maintaining passing accuracy and adapting to tactical demands.

LLM response should state: endurance and agility work (to sustain running demands and pressing adaptation)
LLM response should state: passing precision exercises (to maintain your target pass accuracy)

summarization.question: Can you give me a comprehensive summary of how I've developed and managed my soccer involvement alongside my professional career, including how I've prepared for matches, handled leadership roles, and balanced training with other commitments?
summarization.ideal_summary: Over the course of our discussions, you have progressively balanced your career as a clinical psychologist with your growing involvement in soccer. Initially, you focused on managing your time and finances to accommodate both work and your new hobby, emphasizing scheduling, budgeting, and maintaining physical and mental health. Leveraging your professional expertise, you began supporting your teammates' mental preparation through mindfulness, goal setting, and team-building strategies. As you took on the role of right midfielder, you prepared through targeted technical, tactical, physical, and mental training, while also learning to communicate effectively with your coach and manage practice alongside organizational responsibilities. Your leadership skills were recognized and further developed through leading by example, effective communication, and strategic planning. Throughout, you adapted your training schedule to prevent overtraining, incorporating recovery and nutrition strategies. You also planned for contingencies like weather disruptions and balanced physical and mental aspects of soccer to maintain overall well-being. This journey reflects a thoughtful integration of your professional life with athletic development, leadership growth, and practical management of training and team dynamics.
summarization.synthesis_required: Integrating multiple facets of personal, professional, and athletic development into a coherent narrative showing progression and balance
rubric: LLM response should contain: you focused on managing your time and finances to accommodate both work and your new hobby, emphasizing scheduling, budgeting, and maintaining physical and mental health
LLM response should contain: Leveraging your professional expertise, you began supporting your teammates' mental preparation through mindfulness, goal setting, and team-building strategies
LLM response should contain: you prepared through targeted technical, tactical, physical, and mental training, while also learning to communicate effectively with your coach
LLM response should contain: Your leadership skills were recognized and further developed through leading by example, effective communication, and strategic planning
LLM response should contain: you adapted your training schedule to prevent overtraining, incorporating recovery and nutrition strategies
LLM response should contain: You also planned for contingencies like weather disruptions and balanced physical and mental aspects of soccer to maintain overall well-being

summarization.question: Can you give me a summary of how my role and performance as vice-captain have developed over time and influenced my contributions to the team?
summarization.ideal_summary: Your role as vice-captain has evolved significantly through various matches and training sessions, reflecting growth in both leadership and on-field performance. Early on, you focused on balancing your responsibilities with personal goals, managing time effectively, and maintaining motivation. As you gained experience, you improved your technical skills, tactical awareness, and physical conditioning, which was evident in your increasing goal and assist counts as well as your running distances during matches. Your leadership matured through enhanced communication with teammates and coaches, fostering team cohesion and morale. You also learned to handle the pressures of the role by delegating tasks, supporting teammates, and maintaining your own performance through mental and physical preparation. This progression culminated in you leading by example during key matches, providing strategic input, and actively participating in team discussions, all of which contributed to stronger team dynamics and success on the field.
summarization.synthesis_required: Integrating leadership growth, performance metrics, communication, and personal development into a coherent narrative
rubric: LLM response should contain: you focused on balancing your responsibilities with personal goals, managing time effectively, and maintaining motivation

LLM response should contain: you improved your technical skills, tactical awareness, and physical conditioning, which was evident in your increasing goal and assist counts as well as your running distances during matches
